column3: Social;Phnom Penh:------ A pig slaughterhouse  has been inspected and issued a warning after complaints from neighbors. they say the smell and noise from pigs being killed disturbs their sleep.------Authorities said that after receiving reports that the abattoir was affecting people’s health and noise complaints
column4: the commune chief ordered his subordinates to question the owner and make him agree to measures to prevent disturbing others.------The owner
column5: Mr. Nhem Samak agreed and followed the instructions of the Sangkat authorities. The location is close to the Southeast Asian Television building in Tuek Thla
column6: and residents say it should move outside the city.------Citizens appealed to the authorities more the slaughterhouse to a new location because there were still more criticisms about the business.------http://www.rasmeinews.com/%E1%9E%A2%E1%9E%B6%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%87%E1%9F%92%E1%9E%89%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%92%E1%9E%9A%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%9F%E1%9E%84%E1%9F%92%E1%9E%80%E1%9E%B6%E1%9E%8F%E1%9F%8B%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%82%E1%9F%84%E1%9E%80%E2%80%8B/------ ------ ------
